Package io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics

Class StateMachine

java.lang.Object
io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateMachine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class StateMachine extends Object implements Serializable
A generic state machine implementation for managing transitions between different behavioral and policy states in agent-based models. Supports both individual behavior patterns (BehaviorState) and policy patterns (PolicyState). State transitions are implemented using enumerated states that define transition logic through history updates and state updates.

Transition Cycle

The state machine follows a two-phase update cycle:

  • History Update Phase: Occurs early in the update cycle, handling actions like testing that need to be recorded
  • State Update Phase: Occurs at the end of the update cycle, determining the next state based on current conditions

Usage Patterns

  • For individual agents: manages behavior state transitions
  • For outbreaks/policies: manages policy state transitions
  • Supports forced state transitions and branching state management
See Also:
  • State.BehaviourState
  • State.PolicyState

  • Method Details

    • stub

      public static StateMachine stub()
      Creates a stub state machine without initial state or context.
      Returns:
      a new stub StateMachine instance

    • forceTo

      public void forceTo(State.BehaviourState state)
      Forces a transition to a specific behavior state (except DEAD state). Maintains state branching history when switching between different behavior models.
      Parameters:
      state - the target behavior state
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if attempting to update a policy state machine with a behavior state

    • forceTo

      public void forceTo(State.PolicyState state)
      Forces a transition to a specific policy state. Maintains state branching history when switching between different policy models.
      Parameters:
      state - the target policy state
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if attempting to update a behavior state machine with a policy state

    • performStateUpdate

      public void performStateUpdate(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, PersonState person, Sampler rng)
      Updates the state machine and stores the new person state. Handles death state transitions automatically.
      Parameters:
      builder - the builder for constructing immutable person state
      person - the current person state
      rng - the random number generator for stochastic operations

    • prepareUpdate

      public void prepareUpdate()
      Prepares the state machine for an update cycle by resetting context flags.

    • rememberCurrentState

      public void rememberCurrentState(State<?,?,?,?> state)
      Remembers the current state if switching between different behavior/policy models. Only remembers state branches when switching to a different model (different enum type).
      Parameters:
      state - the target state to compare against current state

    • returnFromBranch

      public void returnFromBranch()
      Returns to a previously remembered state from a branch. Appropriately handles both behavior and policy state transitions.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the state machine's current state.

      Returns:
      the name of the current state
